vulnerable_road_users.description: Motorcyclists riding on the right side of the road, moving in the same direction as the ego car
vulnerable_road_users.explanation: Since they are using the same lane, their presence requires caution and potentially altered driving speed to maintain a safe distance

traffic cones.description: Striped traffic cones placed at the edge of the left side of the road, indicating a separation from construction or a blocked area
traffic cones.explanation: These cones signal that a portion of the road or verge is not accessible and that the ego car should stay clear of this area to maintain a safe lane position

barriers.description: A long green barrier running along the left side of the road, possibly indicating a construction zone or an area off-limits to vehicles
barriers.explanation: This barrier guides the ego car to stay in the current lane as adjacent areas are restricted for travel

general_perception.description and explanation: In the traffic scene, there are motorcyclists observed on the right side of the road, traveling in the same direction as the ego car. The presence of these motorcyclists necessitates caution and may require the ego car to adjust its speed to maintain a safe following distance. Additionally, striped traffic cones are positioned at the edge of the left side of the road, signaling that part of the road or the adjacent area is inaccessible. The ego car must avoid this area to ensure it remains in the correct lane. Furthermore, there is a long green barrier along the left side of the road, likely indicating a construction zone or a restricted area. This barrier serves as a guide for the ego car to stay in its current lane, as the areas next to the barrier are not available for vehicular traffic. There are no other vehicles, traffic signs, traffic lights, or other objects reported in the scene.

1.description and explanation: This object is a cyclist riding a bicycle. Cyclists share the road with motor vehicles but typically move at slower speeds. For the ego car, encountering a cyclist requires increased vigilance and potentially reducing speed or changing lanes to maintain a safe passing distance. It is crucial for the safety of both the motorist and the cyclist that the driver observes all local traffic laws related to sharing the road with bicycles.

2.description and explanation: This object is a cyclist, visible as an individual riding a bicycle. Cyclists are considered vulnerable road users and often share the road with motorized vehicles. From a driving perspective, the presence of a cyclist necessitates cautious and considerate driving, especially while overtaking or approaching intersections. The ego car must maintain a safe distance and should be prepared to adjust speed or change lanes if necessary to ensure the safety of the cyclist.

driving_suggestion: Maintain a safe following distance behind the motorcyclists and be prepared to adjust speed due to their presence and potential maneuvers. Stay within the marked lanes, paying attention to the traffic cones on the left. Exercise caution due to potentially reduced traction from damp road conditions. Continue monitoring the environment for additional road users or changes not currently visible in the field of view.
